", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Type) (n x nx : nat) (o : option A) (e1 : env A) (e2 : list A), length e2 = n -> n + x = nx -> raw_insert nx o (concat e1 e2) = concat (raw_insert x o e1) e2

Premises:
concat : forall A : Type, env A -> list A -> env A
env = fun A : Type => list (option A) : Type -> Type Arguments env _%type_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.D {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments T
raw_insert : forall A : Type, nat -> option A -> env A -> env A
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
agree_insert : forall (A : Type) (e1 e2 : env A) (k : nat), agree e1 e2 k -> forall (x : nat) (o : option A), x <= k -> agree (raw_insert x o e1) (raw_insert x o e2) (1 + k)
length_concat : forall (A : Type) (e2 : list A) (e1 : env A) (n1 n : nat), length e1 <= n1 -> n1 + length e2 = n -> length (concat e1 e2) <= n
subsume_cons : forall (A : Type) (sub : A -> A -> Prop) (o : option A) (e1 e2 : env A), osub sub o (lookup 0 e2) -> subsume sub e1 (tl e2) -> subsume sub (o :: e1) e2
agree_concat : forall (A : Type) (e : list A) (e1 e2 : env A) (k n : nat), agree e1 e2 k -> k + length e = n -> agree (concat e1 e) (concat e2 e) n
subsume_insert : forall (A : Type) (sub : A -> A -> Prop) (e1 e2 : env A), subsume sub e1 e2 -> forall (x : nat) (o1 o2 : option A), osub sub o1 o2 -> subsume sub (raw_insert x o1 e1) (raw_insert x o2 e2)
lookup_insert_bingo : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), x = y -> lookup x (raw_insert y o e) = o
insert_eq_insert_2 : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (a1 a2 : A) (e1 e2 : env A), insert x a1 e1 = insert x a2 e2 -> forall b : A, insert x b e1 = insert x b e2
insert_eq_insert_1 : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (a1 a2 : A) (e1 e2 : env A), insert x a1 e1 = insert x a2 e2 -> a1 = a2
subsume_insert_inversion : forall (A : Type) (sub : A -> A -> Prop) (e1 : env A) (x : nat) (a2 : A) (e2 : env A), subsume sub e1 (insert x a2 e2) -> exists (f1 : env A) (a1 : A), e1 = insert x a1 f1 /\ subsume sub f1 e2 /\ sub a1 a2
length_insert_general : forall (A : Type) (x k : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), length e = k -> length (raw_insert x o e) = mymax (1 + k) (1 + x)
lookup_insert_recent : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), x < y -> lookup x (raw_insert y o e) = lookup x e
raw_insert_successor : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), raw_insert (S x) o e = lookup 0 e :: raw_insert x o (tl e)
lookup_insert_old : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), x > y -> lookup x (raw_insert y o e) = lookup (x - 1) e
raw_insert_zero : forall (A : Type) (o : option A) (e : env A), raw_insert 0 o e = o :: e
length_insert_independent : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (k x : nat) (a : A), length (insert x a e) <= k -> forall (y : nat) (o : option A), y < k -> length (raw_insert y o e) <= k
lookup_shift_insert : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), lookup (shift y x) (raw_insert y o e) = lookup x e
empty_eq_insert : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (o : A) (e : env A), empty A = insert x o e -> False
length_insert : forall (A : Type) (x k km1 : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), length e <= km1 -> km1 <= k - 1 -> x < k -> length (raw_insert x o e) <= k
subsume_cons_cons_inversion : forall (A : Type) (sub : A -> A -> Prop) (o1 o2 : option A) (e1 e2 : list (option A)), subsume sub (o1 :: e1) (o2 :: e2) -> osub sub o1 o2 /\ subsume sub e1 e2
fold_insert : forall (A B : Type) (f : option A -> B -> B) (o : option A) (e : env A) (accu : B), fold f (raw_insert 0 o e) accu = f o (fold f e accu)
insert_eq_insert_3 : forall (A : Type) (x1 x2 : nat) (a1 a2 : A) (e1 e2 : env A), insert x1 a1 e1 = insert x2 a2 e2 -> x1 <> x2 -> exists (e : env A) (y1 y2 : nat), e1 = insert y1 a2 e /\ e2 = insert y2 a1 e /\ shift x1 y1 = x2 /\ y2 = (if le_gt_dec x1 y1 then x1 else x1 - 1)
nth_error_In : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (n : nat) (x : A), nth_error l n = Some x -> In x l
map_raw_insert : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : nat) (e : env A), map f (raw_insert x None e) = raw_insert x None (map f e)
insert_insert : forall (A : Type) (k s : nat) (a b : option A) (e : env A), k <= s -> raw_insert k a (raw_insert s b e) = raw_insert (1 + s) b (raw_insert k a e)
defined_implies_below_length : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (x k : nat) (a : A), length e <= k -> lookup x e = Some a -> x < k
fold_invariant : forall (A B : Type) (P : env A -> B -> Prop) (f : option A -> B -> B) (accu : B), P (empty A) accu -> (forall (o : option A) (e : env A) (accu0 : B), P e accu0 -> P (raw_insert 0 o e) (f o accu0)) -> forall e : env A, P e (fold f e accu)
lookup_beyond_length : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (x : nat), length e <= x -> lookup x e = None
insert_nil : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A), insert x a e = nil -> False
length_insert_reverse_2 : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (k x : nat) (a : A), length (insert x a e) <= k + 1 -> length e <= k
In_nth_error : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (x : A), In x l -> exists n : nat, nth_error l n = Some x
length_insert_reverse_1 : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (k x : nat) (a : A), length (insert x a e) <= k -> x < k
map_insert_eq : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : nat) (a : A) (b : B) (e : env A), f a = b -> map f (insert x a e) = insert x b (map f e)
nth_overflow : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (n : nat) (d : A), length l <= n -> nth n l d = d
existsb_nth : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l : list A) (n : nat) (d : A), n < length l -> existsb f l = false -> f (nth n l d) = false
map_insert : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A), map f (insert x a e) = insert x (f a) (map f e)
insert_insert_always : forall (A : Type) (k s : nat) (a b : option A) (e : env A), raw_insert k a (raw_insert s b e) = raw_insert (shift k s) b (raw_insert (if le_gt_dec k s then k else k - 1) a e)
nth_error_nth' : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (n : nat) (d : A), n < length l -> nth_error l n = Some (nth n l d)
map_insert_map : forall (A : Type) (f g h : A -> A) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A), (forall a0 : A, f (g a0) = g (h a0)) -> map f (insert x a (map g e)) = insert x (f a) (map g (map h e))
nth_split : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l : list A) (d : A), n < length l -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ nth n l d :: l2 /\ length l1 = n
nth_indep : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (n : nat) (d d' : A), n < length l -> nth n l d = nth n l d'

intros A n x nx o e1 e2 H1 H2.
rewrite H1. rewrite H2. reflexivity.
Qed.```
